item.title: LCP68.美观的花束——sliding_window
item.description: class Solution { public: const int mod = 1e9+7; int beautifulBouquet(vector<int>& flowers, int cnt) { int n = flowers.size(); int ret = 0; int left = 0,right = 0; unordered_map<int,int> count; int option = 1; while(right <= n){ if(option == 1){ //right指针向右边滑动，更新窗口上限 if(right == n){ option = 2; continue ;
